title: Maguire Hears The Man United Jeers
description:
The FC crew break down to Manchester United's 3-1 win over Crystal Palace and question if the Australian fans were wrong to boo club captain Harry Maguire. Plus, the guys react to Erik ten Hag's interview with Rob Dawson including the new manager's thoughts on Cristiano Ronaldo fitting into his system and Kasey Keller sits down for an exclusive one on one with Bayern Munich CEO Oliver Kahn.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Harry Maguire booed on Manchester United's preseason tour; Erik ten Hag says Ronaldo can be a pressing forward; De Ligt officially joins Bayern
